entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
